title: The Week of Linda Long: The Praying Negotiator
summary: 72-year-old Linda Long uses her unique skills in praying and negotiating to restore peace and resolve conflicts in her community over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Die 72-jährige Linda Long nutzt ihre einzigartigen Fähigkeiten im Beten und Verhandeln, um innerhalb einer Woche Frieden zu stiften und Konflikte in ihrer Gemeinde zu lösen.
summaryDutch: De 72-jarige Linda Long gebruikt haar unieke vaardigheden in bidden en onderhandelen om in de loop van een week vrede te herstellen en conflicten in haar gemeenschap op te lossen.
summaryFrench: Linda Long, 72 ans, utilise ses compétences uniques en prière et en négociation pour rétablir la paix et résoudre les conflits dans sa communauté au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Linda Long starts her week by silently praying at the local park, gathering spiritual strength for the challenges ahead. A dispute at a nearby market draws her attention. Linda, feeling energetic, steps in to mediate between the arguing parties.
Feeling triumphant from yesterday's success, Linda visits a local school to help resolve a funding conflict. Her experience and calm demeanor help her guide the school board to a peaceful agreement.
Mid-week finds Linda feeling a bit sad as she reflects on past conflicts that couldn't be resolved. She spends time praying for those involved, asking for guidance and peace.
Revitalized by her prayers, Linda is approached by community leaders to mediate a looming neighborhood dispute. The mood is eerie as the meeting begins after dusk, but Linda's presence brings calm.
Linda feels peaceful as she prepares a community breakfast, bringing together yesterday’s disputing parties to share a meal. Relationships begin to mend under her watchful and caring eye.

Linda, feeling epic, organizes a large community gathering to celebrate the reconciliations achieved throughout the week. Her energy and dedication inspire others to volunteer and engage in community building.

On a quiet, reflective Sunday, Linda attends church, offering thanks for a successful week. She prays for the strength to continue her work, knowing her unique blend of hobbies makes her an essential figure in her community.

ending: Through prayer and negotiation, Linda Long weaves peace into the fabric of her community, proving that real heroes come in all ages and forms.
moral: The combination of spiritual guidance and practical negotiation can resolve conflicts and restore peace.
